mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (cmt_no, isbn, cmt_mbti, cmt_nickname, cmt_content, cmt_date, cmt_id) values(cmt_no.nextval, #{isbn}, #{cmt_mbti}, #{cmt_nickname}, #{cmt_content}, sysdate, #{cmt_id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where isbn =#{isbn}
mapper.update: update comments set CMT_CONTENT = #{cmt_content} where CMT_NO= #{cmt_no}
mapper.select: select cmt_id from comments where cmt_no=#{cmt_no}
select * from warn where m_id=#{m_id} and cmt_no=#{cmt_no}
mapper.update: update warn set w_count=#{w_count}, w_reason=#{w_reason}, w_date=sysdate where cmt_no=#{cmt_no} and m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select * from warn_check where m_id=#{m_id} and cmt_no=#{cmt_no}
select count(*) from comments where cmt_id = #{id}
select * from comments left join book on book.isbn=comments.isbn where cmt_id=#{id}
select * from comments_like where cmt_no=#{cmt_no} and cmt_like_id=#{cmt_like_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET CMT_LIKE = CMT_LIKE +1 WHERE CMT_NO=#{cmt_no}
mapper.delete: delete from comments_like where cmt_no=#{cmt_no} and cmt_like_id=#{cmt_like_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET CMT_LIKE = CMT_LIKE -1 WHERE CMT_NO=#{cmt_no}
mapper.select: select cmt_no from (select ROWNUM rnum, x.* from (select cmt_no, count(*) cnt, max(cmt_like_date) from comments_like where cmt_like_date between to_char(sysdate-7) and sysdate group by cmt_no order by cnt desc, max(cmt_like_date) desc) x ) where rnum >=1 and rnum <=4
select count(*) from comments where cmt_id =#{cmt_id} and isbn=#{isbn}
select count(*) from comments where cmt_id =#{id}
select * from comments order by cmt_no
